about.title: About Developer
about.subtitle: A developer who creates fun services using AI and web technologies

projectStory.title: How did this project start?
projectStory.content1: "How similar do we look?" - It started with a question that everyone wonders about at some point. I wanted to solve simple curiosity with AI technology and create a web service that people could use for fun.
projectStory.content2: During the development process, I tested various face recognition APIs and considered user experience to complete the current service. Seeing many people use it every day, I feel that technology can add fun to everyday life.

guide.title: User Guide
guide.subtitle: Learn how to effectively use the FaceFalcon service and get tips for accurate analysis results.

step1.item1: Front-facing photo: Prepare a photo with the face facing forward
step1.item2: High quality: Clear photo of at least 200x200 pixels
step1.item3: Bright lighting: Taken in a bright environment where the face is clearly visible

step2.item1: Add photos to compare to each upload area
step2.item2: Select the required analysis mode (individual comparison, group analysis, etc.)
step2.item3: Click "Start Analysis" button and check results

goodPhoto.title: ‚úÖ Good Photo Conditions
items: Natural light or bright indoor lighting

q1.question: Q. Are the analysis results accurate?
q1.answer: AI analysis shows high accuracy, but results may vary depending on lighting, angle, expression, makeup, etc. Please use it for fun and reference, and do not use it as medical or legal evidence.

q2.question: Q. Are uploaded photos saved?
q2.answer: No. Uploaded photos are automatically deleted immediately after analysis and are not saved in any form. Privacy protection is our top priority.

q3.question: Q. What file formats are supported?
q3.answer: JPG, PNG, JPEG formats are supported. File size is up to 10MB, and high-quality images of about 1-5MB are recommended for optimal analysis.

q4.question: Q. Can I use photos with multiple people?
q4.answer: The most accurate results are obtained when there is only one face per photo. If there are multiple people, the AI selects the main face, which may produce undesired results.

q5.question: Q. What relationships can be compared?
q5.answer: You can compare people of all relationships including family (siblings, relatives), friends, couples, celebrity look-alikes, etc. It objectively analyzes facial similarity between two people.

q6.question: Q. The analysis failed. What should I do?
q6.answer: Please check if the face is clearly visible in a front-facing photo. If it still doesn't work, try again with a different photo or contact us at

uploadIssues.title: Upload Issues
